name: polypropylene (PP)
description: Polypropylene is a durable thermoplastic polymer used in packaging, textiles, stationery, plastic parts, containers, lab equipment, loudspeakers, automotive components, and polymer banknotes. It resists many chemical solvents, bases, and acids.

name: paper
description: Paper is a thin material made by pressing and drying cellulose pulp from wood, rags, or grasses into flexible sheets.

name: glass
description: Glass is a non-crystalline, often transparent amorphous solid.

name: plastic
description: Plastic is a material consisting of any of a wide range of synthetic or semi-synthetic organic compounds that are malleable and so can be molded into solid objects.
